components.text:
Hello {{name}}, there’s an important update for your booking {{order_id}} scheduled on {{experience_date}}.

Reply with "Hi" to review and confirm the update.

editDetails.reason: Template can be edited only after 24 hours of last edit

components.text: Hello {{Name}}, this is a reminder from CherishX regarding your past booking. Please let us know if you’d like our support for the upcoming occasion.

Dear {{Name}}, 

We tried reaching you regarding your recent request with CherishX but couldn’t get through. Please reply to this message or call us at 8010679679 so we can assist you further.

*Greetings from CherishX,*
We hope this message finds you well. 
Last year, we had the pleasure of being part of your celebration, and it was truly a delightful experience for us. 
With your special occasion coming up again, we’d love to know if you’re planning to celebrate with us this year as well.

Looking forward to hearing from you!
Testing Template for order id {{order_id}}
Choose you material pickup time slot for order{{order_id}}
Hi {{name}}, happy code for your booking is {{happy_code}}. Pls share with the partner if you are happy with your experience.
CherishX
Hi {{name}}, experience start code for your booking is {{happy_code}}. Pls share with the partner to start your experience.
CherishX
Dear {{name}}, your booking start token is {{token}}. Please share this with our Partner to begin your service.
CherishX

Hi 👋 Hope you’re doing well! We were chatting earlier about the dining for your upcoming event, and I just wanted to check in — are we still on track to make it magical together, or have you already gone with another plan? Either way, I’d love to hear from you so we can plan ahead. 🎈✨
Team CherishX.

Hi 👋 Hope you’re doing well! We were chatting earlier about the décor for your upcoming event, and I just wanted to check in — are we still on track to make it magical together, or have you already gone with another plan? Either way, I’d love to hear from you so we can plan ahead. 🎈✨
Team CherishX

Dear {{Name}}, Hi, I recently tried reaching out regarding your request but couldn’t get through. If you have any questions or need help, feel free to reply or call us at 8010679679. We’d love to assist you. Thanks for considering us!
Team CherishX

Dear {{Name}}, I recently tried to reach you in response to your request to connect with the team. However, I wasn't able to get through to you. If you still have any queries or doubts about our products and services, please reply to this message or call us back at 8010679679. We'd be happy to answer any questions and help you with your purchase. Thank you for considering us. We value your business and look forward to speaking with you soon.
Team CherishX
Tell us about your experience

Hi {{name}},

We hope everything went well with your recent CherishX experience.

To help us improve, we’d appreciate it if you could take a moment to share your feedback.

Just click the button below to leave a quick review.

Thank you for your time and support.
Tell us about your experience

Hi {{name}},
Thanks a lot for choosing CherishX! We hope that we were able to create a memorable experience for you.
Please take a moment to provide us with some helpful feedback—it’ll only take a few minutes.

Kindly click on Review button below:
Keep CherishX-ing!
Reminder for your upcoming booking

Hey!

Just a gentle reminder for your today's booking with us. So what's next?

💆‍♀️ We don't like to Disturb! Your booking is confirmed. Sit back & relax while we prepare your experience. We will only call you if we need some details. Your booking will be completed within the time slot selected by you while booking.

👨‍🔧 You can check your host / decorator details from the link below.

📋 Make sure that, we have all your details with us. Check if you have filled all the post-booking details like Delivery Address, Custom Photographs, Personalised Message etc (if any) ? If you haven’t, please select the Bookings section from the menu on the App or Website and update the details!

🤙 Happy to Help anytime! You can call us on +91-8081833833 for any help regarding your booking.
Keep CherishX-ing!
Your Booking is Confirmed!

You are all set to cherish your {{experience_name}} experience. We will only call you if we need some details. Your host/decorator details will be provided through email/whatsapp 3-12 hours before the booking.

To manage and track your booking status you can use the link below. Also make sure we have all your details such as address, photos & other relevant information in case of personalised bookings.
Keep CherishX-ing!

Dear {{name}},

You are one step away from enjoying the awesome {{experience_name}} experience.

At CherishX we love to personalise the experience to your taste. For achieving this we have a lot of interesting and unique customisations as add-ons to turbo charge your experience!

Check and book any customisation to curate your experience for your loved one(s). 🥳🥳
Keep CherishX-ing!

Dear {{name}},

Congratulations on your booking {{experience_name}}! 🎊

Remember, please return the rented material in the same condition as received, within the agreed time frame. ⏰

Attached is the Rental Agreement for your reference. It is considered auto-approved.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. We're here to help!

Thank you.
Keep CherishX-ing!
{{subject}}
Keep CherishX-ing!

Hello {{name}}! It’s {{agent}} from CherishX.

Time flies, and it's been a year since we had the joy of organizing your loved one's celebration. We hope life has treated you well since then! 🌟💞 

Guess what? We've been busy curating exciting new themes and packages that we can't wait for you to explore. As a token of our gratitude for your loyalty, we're thrilled to offer you an exclusive 10% discount on your next booking! Simply use the code LOYAL10 at checkout.🎁

*Our New Categories -*
Premium Decors - https://cherishx.com/experiences/delhi-ncr/premium-decors

*Get more with CherishX now*
Return Gifts
Banquet Decorations
Haldi & Mehndi Setups
Tenting on Rent
Games and Coordinators
Reply "STOP" to Unsubscribe
Your Booking needs attention!

Congratulations on your booking! 🎉 Please take a moment to review the details of your booking using the link provided below. It's important to verify your date, time slot, and address for accuracy. If you happen to notice any discrepancies, kindly notify us immediately so we can rectify them.

If everything appears correct, simply click the *'Confirm'* button on the track order page to confirm your booking details. We're here to assist you, and if you wish to make any changes on your own, please inform us in advance so that we can ensure your booking is executed according to your expectations.

Your satisfaction is our priority, and we're dedicated to making your experience smooth and enjoyable. Thank you for choosing us!
Keep CherishX-ing!
Missing Details for your order.

Hi {{name}}, You forgot to fill the order details for {{order_visible_id}}. Click the link below to update the same. Some mandatory details are required to be filled timely in order to ensure smooth execution of your booking. Please make sure to provide them, otherwise your experience may got delayed. Kindly reply on the same chat if you face any issues. 
Kindly ignore the message if already done.

Team CherishX
Keep CherishX-ing!

*{{1}}* is your verification code.
For your security, do not share this code.
This code will expire in 5 minutes.
